resume_sections.summary: Software engineer with hands-on experience building production backend systems using Python, JavaScript, and SQL. Proven track record delivering scalable solutions in SaaS and B2B integration environments. Strong foundation in relational databases, API design, and full-stack development.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained 6 production applications with high deployment stability
Designed and implemented a payment page using JavaScript Payment SDK
Integrated SQL database for transaction tracking and persistence
Built real-time delivery tracking using JavaScript, WebSockets, and SQL
Implemented backend and frontend features using Python and JavaScript
Worked with relational databases using primary key-based data modeling
Collaborated with product, design, and QA teams in agile environment

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Fixed bugs during deployment and improved overall code quality
Participated in sprint planning and agile development cycles
Created case models aligned with business and product requirements

education: Master's in Computer Science, University of Alabama at Birmingham, USA (Jan 2023 – Apr 2025) — GPA: 3.30/4.00
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science, Jain University, Bangalore, India (Jan 2019 – Jul 2022) — CGPA: 7.89/10
key_projects: Student Database System (Feb 2022 – Jun 2022): Co-led development of a Python web application to manage student academic data. Designed dashboard interface and integrated SQL database for storage and retrieval.
Progressive Web Chat App (Feb 2021 – May 2021): Built a secure chat system using Python with encryption and PWA principles for cross-platform usability.
